description: a(n)=Sum_{d|n} d*numbpart(d), where numbpart(d)=number of partitions of d, cf. A000041.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (Haskell)a061259 n = sum $ zipWith (*) divs $ map a000041 divs            where divs = a027750_row' n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 31 2015
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 21 2001
